title: High-Tech Manufacturing Leader
description: In 2022, Myanmar had a remarkable 92.58% of its manufacturing value added coming from medium and high-tech manufacturing, indicating a strong focus on advanced manufacturing sectors.

title: Lowest Livestock Production Index
description: Myanmar's livestock production index was only 35.52 in 2022, one of the lowest globally, indicating challenges in the livestock sector.

title: Weak Property Rights and Governance
description: In 2023, Myanmar scored a 1 out of 6 in the CPIA property rights and rule-based governance rating, reflecting significant issues in governance and property rights.

title: Short Compulsory Education Duration
description: Myanmar mandates only 5 years of compulsory education as of 2023, which is among the shortest durations worldwide.

title: High Female Representation in Academia
description: In 2018, 84.53% of academic staff in Myanmar's tertiary education were female, showcasing a high level of female participation in academia.
